alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 12:53PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino County through 130 PM MST... At 1252 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Wupatki National Monument, or 26 miles northeast of Flagstaff, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Coconino County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County
